articles.title: Music mogul Jerry Moss, co-founder of A&M Records, dies at 88 - The Guardian
articles.description: With A&M partner Herb Alpert, Moss was behind the success of the Carpenters, Cat Stevens and the Police, among hundreds of artists
articles.content: Jerry Moss, a music industry mogul who co-founded A&M Records with Herb Alpert and rose from a Los Angeles garage to the heights of success with hits by Alpert, the Police, the Carpenters and hun… [+3702 chars]

articles.title: Lily Allen Reveals Her Dad Called the Police When She Lost Her Virginity at Age 12 - E! NEWS
articles.description: Lily Allen recalled how her dad, actor Keith Allen, called the police after thinking the then 12-year-old had gone missing—but she was really out losing her virginity.
articles.content:
Lily Allen was somewhere only she knewwhich led to a little bit of trouble.
